tosdr.tldr: "for reasons including but not limited to" means Huawei may suspend your account for no reason.
tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
quoteText: You agree that HUAWEI can solely decide, without prior notification, to terminate your access to all or part of this website's functions, for reasons including but not limited to:
